text:
For a starter, the OAuth 2 ones and the ones in oauthlib.common could do with some more descriptive messages.

Also see https://github.com/requests/requests-oauthlib/issues/96
title: Improve error messages

text: Is this still relevant? Seems to me that the errors defined for OAuth 2 in  oauthlib.oauth2.rfc6749.errors is pretty good, nor can I find any errors in oauthlib.common at all?

There is one old and annoyingly vague error that keeps causing confusion that I'll aim to address the coming week in https://github.com/idan/oauthlib/blob/master/oauthlib/common.py#L136

If the OAuth 2 ones are good then that is great, added this issue as a note to self to look it over since most were created quite quickly.
